## okta-admin groups adduser

Adds a user to a group with OKTA_GROUP type.

### Synopsis

Adds a user to a group with OKTA_GROUP type.

```
okta-admin groups adduser <groupId> <userId> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for adduser
```
